subject: Pedals
description_text:
Hello! I just purchased the new simsonn pro x pedals and was wondering when
or if they will be supported by AC evo or f1 25. I understand it is a new
product but I have also heard that it is just a bug that needs to be fixed.

conversations.body_text: Hi Benjamin Wolf,     We will be releasing version 2.0.9 in the next couple of days, and both of your games will be supported with telemetry. In addition, SimHub 9.9.3 already supports over 100 racing games and is fully compatible with SIMSONN pedals, so you don’t need to worry. The current issue is a bug in the calibration software, and we will fix it shortly.

Thank you very much, have a wonderful day!

On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 10:23 PM service@simsonn.com
